'''Diamond Thompson''' is a teen who had a large ovarian cyst.

==History==
Diamond was attending the sexual education presentation at the hospital when she collapsed in pain. They took her for a CT scan, which showed a large ovarian cyst as well as ovarian torsion. She was taken into surgery, where the cyst was removed and blood flow was restored to her ovary. Despite some unexpected bleeding, the surgery was successful and her mother was told they were able to preserve both her ovaries.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Her mother came to the hospital to be with her when she had surgery.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She likes anime.
